bike.description: Surly Big Dummy, Surly 4130 CroMoly steel. Main triangle double-butted. TIG-welded cargo specific engineered for stiffness

Shimano Deore, M591 SGS. Top-normal traditional
Avid BB7, Cable actuated. 180mm rotors front & rear
Kalloy, AS-008, 25.4mm bar clamp. Aluminum. 4-bolt. Black
